seriesJson.title: Poetry and the American
seriesJson.description: Twenty half-hour programs designed to further the enjoyment of poetry.

node.title: Women poets
node.description: An anthology, read by Miriam Ostroff; and Winifred Mann of the Actors Workshop.

node.title: Readings of Emily Dickinson
node.description: A lecture-recital by Miriam Ostroff, poetry reader and lecturer, on the works of Emily Dickinson.

node.title: Readings of Robert Frost
node.description: A lecture-recital by Robert Beloof, poet and teacher, on Robert Frost's work.

node.title: Things of this world
node.description: Discussion and reading by Anthony and Miriam Ostroff.

node.title: Social protest
node.description: Discussion and reading by Robert Beloof; and Eleanor McKinney of the KPFA staff.

node.title: The American vision
node.description: A discussion and reading by Anthony Ostroff, Robert Beloof and Richard Deering.

node.title: Senior poets
node.description: An anthology of the poetry of some of America's major poets, read by Miriam and Anthony Ostroff and George Marchi.

node.title: Light verse
node.description: An anthology, read by Anthony Ostroff and Robert Beloof.

node.title: Readings of e.e. cummings
node.description: A lecture-recital by Robert Beloof on the works of e.e. cummings.

node.title: American war poetry
node.description: Discussion and reading by Robert Horan, Anthony Ostroff and Robert Beloof.

node.title: Readings of Hart Crane
node.description: A lecture-recital by Robert Beloof on works of Hart Crane.

node.title: Middle generation poets
node.description: An anthology, read by Anthony Ostroff and Eleanor McKinney.

node.title: Readings of T.S. Eliot
node.description: A lecture-recital by Anthony Ostroff on the works of T.S. Eliot.

node.title: American love poetry
node.description: Discussion and reading by Miriam and Anthony Ostroff and Robert Beloof.

node.title: Readings of Frederic Goddard Tucker
node.description: A lecture-recital by John Edwards, teacher at the University of California, on the works of Frederic Goddard Tuckerman.

node.title: Readings of Wallace Stevens
node.description: A lecture-recital by Don Geiger, poet and teacher at the University of California, on the works of Wallace Stevens.

node.title: Introductory program
node.description: Introductory program by Anthony Ostroff, poet and teacher, and director of the series.

node.title: Nineteenth century poetry
node.description: Discussion and reading by Robert Beloof and Don Geiger.

node.title: Younger poets
node.description: An anthology, read by Anthony Ostroff and Don Geiger.

node.title: Death
node.description: Discussion and reading by Anthony Ostroff, Robert Horan and Robert Beloof, poets and teachers at the University of California.
